title: One Man Band Configuration
description: Configuration file for One Man Band - a Tauri desktop app for orchestrating git worktrees

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for editor validation

main.description: Configuration for the main terminal pane

command.description: Command to run in the main terminal pane

fontFamily.description: Font family for the main terminal

fontSize.description: Font size in points for the main terminal

padding.description: Padding around the terminal content in pixels

fontSize.description: Font size in points for drawer terminals

padding.description: Padding around the terminal content in pixels

apps.description: External applications to open directories with

terminal.description: Terminal application name (as recognized by the system)

editor.description: Code editor application name (as recognized by the system)

directory.description: Directory where worktrees are created. Supports placeholder: {{ repo_directory }}

baseBranch.description: Branch to create new worktrees from

oneOf.description: 'auto' uses default branch (main/master), 'current' uses checked out branch

name.description: Branch name to create worktrees from

copy.description: Configuration for copying files to new worktrees

gitIgnored.description: Copy gitignored files from the project to new worktrees

except.description: Glob patterns to exclude from copying

focusNewBranchNames.description: Focus the branch name input when creating a new worktree, allowing immediate editing

deleteWorktree.description: Delete the worktree after successful merge

deleteLocalBranch.description: Delete the local branch after successful merge

deleteRemoteBranch.description: Delete the remote branch after successful merge

includeProjects.description: Include open projects in keyboard navigation (cmd+j/k, cmd+1-9). When false, only cycles through open worktrees.

activityTimeout.description: Time in ms after last activity before progress indicator turns off

showIdleCheck.description: Show checkmark when activity stops (idle state)

scratch.description: Configuration for scratch terminals (general-purpose terminals not tied to any project)

startOnLaunch.description: Create a scratch terminal when the app launches

command.description: Command to run for AI-assisted actions (e.g., 'claude')

mergeWorktreeWithConflicts.description: Prompt template for resolving merge conflicts. Variables: {{ worktree_dir }}, {{ worktree_name }}, {{ branch }}, {{ target_branch }}, {{ conflicted_files }}

rebaseWorktreeWithConflicts.description: Prompt template for resolving rebase conflicts. Variables: {{ worktree_dir }}, {{ worktree_name }}, {{ branch }}, {{ target_branch }}, {{ conflicted_files }}

toggleDrawer.description: Shortcut to toggle the drawer panel

toggleRightPanel.description: Shortcut to toggle the right panel

terminalCopy.description: Shortcut to copy selected text in terminals

terminalPaste.description: Shortcut to paste text in terminals

worktreePrev.description: Shortcut to switch to the previous worktree

worktreeNext.description: Shortcut to switch to the next worktree

runTask.description: Shortcut to open the task runner

newWorkspace.description: Shortcut to create a new workspace

switchFocus.description: Shortcut to switch focus between main pane and drawer

taskSwitcher.description: Shortcut to open the task switcher

expandDrawer.description: Shortcut to expand the drawer to full screen

previousView.description: Shortcut to switch between current and previous view (worktree or project)

zoomIn.description: Shortcut to increase terminal font size in focused pane

zoomOut.description: Shortcut to decrease terminal font size in focused pane

zoomReset.description: Shortcut to reset terminal font size in focused pane to base size

commandPalette.description: Shortcut to open the command palette

projectSwitcher.description: Shortcut to open the project switcher

tasks.description: Configurable tasks that can be run per-worktree

shortcutString.description: A keyboard shortcut string. Format: 'mod+key' where mod is ctrl, cmd, alt, shift. 'cmd' = Cmd on macOS, Ctrl on other platforms.

other.description: Shortcut to use on non-macOS platforms (Linux, Windows)

shortcutEntry.description: A shortcut entry: either a universal string or platform-specific object

oneOf.description: An array of shortcut entries (strings and/or platform objects)

shortcut.description: A shortcut configuration: string, platform object, or array of both

task.description: A configurable task that can be run in a worktree

name.description: Display name for the task (must be unique)

command.description: Shell command to run. Supports minijinja: {{ branch }}, {{ branch | hash_port }}, {{ branch | sanitize }}, {{ branch | shell_escape }}

kind.description: Task kind: 'command' runs to completion, 'daemon' stays running until stopped

silent.description: If true, task runs without showing output in drawer

shell.description: Override shell to run command with (e.g., '/bin/bash', 'fish')

env.description: Environment variables to set when running the task. Values support minijinja: {{ branch }}, {{ branch | hash_port }}, {{ branch | sanitize }}, {{ branch | shell_escape }}

urls.description: Named URL templates to display when task is running. Key is the link label, value is the URL template. Supports minijinja: {{ branch }}, {{ branch | hash_port }}, {{ branch | sanitize }}, {{ branch | shell_escape }}
